p: To identify strains that are the most genetically related to B/2017 and B/2017-MA, BLAST analysis was performed. The results revealed that the study strains are 99–100% identical to the IBV variants that circulated in the human population in the Novosibirsk region, Altai Republic, and the Republic of Kazakhstan ( Table S1). Thus, strain B/2017 is a typical genetic variant of the IBV that circulated during the 2016–2017 epidemic season, and it is most genetically related to the strains that circulated in Asia at that time.
